name: Road Rhapsody - DO NOT USE WSAD, Use Arrow Keys
name_original: Road Rhapsody - DO NOT USE WSAD, Use Arrow Keys
description:
A pseudo 3D racer with bullet hell smashed in. 
Race or blaze in this fast paced high octane music based shoot 'em up.

You can only shoot when above 120 speed. 

Avoid obstacles, collect pickups, annihilate enemies and try to reach the end.

The level has 3 songs and the enemies, obstacles and pickups are spawned based on music. 

Controls

  •  Arrow keys - move ||  DO NOT USE WSAD
  • Space - shoot when above 120.

 Credits :- 

A Game by Kaafi Rookie.

Fonts - 

  • Thaleah Fat  by Rick Hoppmann
  • Disco Diva by Scott Nuss

Songs -

  • Menu - L A T E N C Y by Mystery Mammal
  • First song - Lost Limbo by Kaafi Rookie
  • Second Song - Synthwave by Ryan Andersen
  • Third Song - Ｗｏｒｋ Ｍｕｓｉｃ by Anonymous420

Sprites -

SpeedoMeter- by pikisuperstar - https://www.freepik.com/vectors/hologram-screen

Plugins -

  • Jacky's Simple Audio Manager - https://github.com/jackyyang09/Simple-Unity-Audio-Manager
  • LASP - Keijiro (modified) - https://github.com/keijiro/Lasp
  • Audio Visualizer (modified) - https://github.com/dacioromero/audio-visualization
